verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
This is the new day of the Kingdom
We lay aside the old
We see each other by the spirit
We are each other's wall
We throw our crowns down at Your feet
And offer them as one
We compel the powers that rule this age
To bow before Your Son
We are a temple made of people establishing thy throne
We stand together hand in hand,
Making ourselves known
We throw our crowns down at Your feet
And offer them as one
We call Your sheep from Babylon
With joy we see them come
Nations rise and nations call
To hear Your prophets'voice
Each one speaks and powers fall,
In Your name they have no choice
We throw our crowns down at Your feet,
And offer them as one
The hills resound with a marching beat,
It's the Kingdom coming forth
